DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the long-term efficacy and safety of posterior juxtascleral injections of open label Anecortave Acetate 15mg administered every 6 months.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Posterior Juxtascleral Injections of Anecortave Acetate 15mg Dose for Long Term Use in Patients With AMD
DOC.criteria: Patients with subfoveal exudative agerelated macular degeneration (AMD) who were previously enrolled in longterm studies with anecortave acetate. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
DOC.keyword: Wet form of age-related macular degeneration
